trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality required by a single data source at the <see langword="EnvDTE.Project" /> level.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see langword="EnvDTE.Project" /> 層級上實作單一資料來源所需的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of descriptors for the data sources in this group.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得這個群組之資料來源的描述項集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection" /> that represents the collection of descriptors for the data sources in this group.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptorCollection" />，表示這個群組之資料來源的描述項集合。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> image that represents the group.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得表示群組的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 影像。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> image that represents the group.
trans-unit.target: 表示群組的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" /> 影像。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> image that represents the group is typically used in design-time pickers.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>代表群組的映像通常用於設計階段選擇器。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the value indicating whether this group is the default group.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得值，指出這個群組是否為預設群組。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this group is the default group; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個群組是預設群組，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the group.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得群組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the group must be unique across all data sources groups at the `EnvDTE.Project` level.
trans-unit.target: 所有資料來源群組在群組的名稱必須是唯一`EnvDTE.Project`層級。
